docs.lead_paragraph: In the beginning, just liniment could speed recovery for an athlete with a nagging muscle pull. That and, of course, rest. Then came the fitness boom, and with it a thriving rehabilitation industry that caters to sore runners and cyclists determined to heal swiftly. Injured athletes today can select from a variety of options, including pricey coaches who specialize in hurry-up recuperation and physical therapists who offer muscle-healing gadgets.

headline.main: For Muscle Injuries, Many Treatments but Little Evidence

docs.abstract: Article on research indicating that, despite wide range of new treatment options and muscle-healing gadgets, athletic injuries need time and rest to heal; photo (M)
